revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Token | name = Ammo fillup | class = AmmoFillup | game = Strife | convid = 298,280,297 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:DummyStrifeItem|DummyStrifeItem]]→AmmoFillup
Changes player's amount of [[Classes:ClipOfBullets|bullets]] for their [[Classes:AssaultGun|assault gun]] to 50. Used in conversations with Front's weapon trainer/dealer when you have less than 50 bullets. If you have more, they don't give you this item, so you don't lose any ammo. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AmmoFillup : {{Class|DummyStrifeItem}} native { {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_AMMOFILLUP" // "Ammo" }
